title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for May 23
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for May 23
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Nordson (NDSN). Nordson Corp.'s shares fell from a record after the maker of industrial dispensing equipment put out fiscal second-quarter results. While earnings beat analysts' average estimate in a Bloomberg survey, they came out ahead by the smallest margin in six quarters. Nordson's third-quarter profit forecast was also in line with estimates.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
